mapper.sql: a.id, a.create_by, a.create_time, a.update_by, a.update_time, a.sys_org_code, a.product_id, a.depart_id, a.product_bar_code, a.batch_no, a.stock_num, a.produce_date, a.exp_date, a.exp_status, a.supplier_id, a.is_long, a.remarks, a.huowei_code, a.msg_send_state, a.record_detail_id, a.spec_num, a.nestat_status, a.spec_unit_id, a.spec_quantity, a.del_flag
LEFT JOIN pd_unit b ON c.unit_id = b.id

c.name as "productName", c.number as "number", c.spec as "spec", c.version as "version", c.registration as "registration", c.purchase_price as "purchasePrice", c.selling_price as "sellingPrice", c.charge_code as "chargeCode", c.is_charge as "isCharge", c.jde_code as "jdeCode"
LEFT JOIN pd_product c ON c.id = a.product_id
left join pd_supplier d on a.supplier_id = d.id
left join pd_vender e on c.vender_id = e.id
LEFT JOIN sys_depart f ON a.depart_id = f.id
LEFT JOIN pd_goods_allocation g ON a.huowei_code = g.code
LEFT JOIN pd_apply_detail h on a.product_id = h.product_id
LEFT JOIN pd_allocation_detail j ON a.product_id = j.product_id
mapper.select: select IFNULL(d.name,'其他') as x, sum(a.stock_num) as y , sum(c.selling_price * a.stock_num) as z from pd_product_stock a left join pd_product c on a.product_id=c.id left join pd_category d on d.id=c.category_two where DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 30 DAY) <= date(a.create_time) and date(a.create_time) <=CURDATE() group by x order by y desc
